message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think it's a game-changer and I'm looking for a serious buyer. I'm willing to offer it to you for $150. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $150 might be a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $135. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to consider that price?
I understand that $110 is still a bit of a stretch, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $125. It's my best price, and I think it's a great deal for both of us. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not at my target price. I'm thinking more along the lines of $105. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can do $115. It's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options. What do you think?
I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
